name: Hula Hoop Race
description:
Ready for a powerful hula hoop challenge?

Hula Hoop Race is perfect for you!

Dodge obstacles to get as many Hoops to the finish line as possible in one piece! At the end of the level, a Hula Hoop party awaits you, The more the Hula Hoops, the cooler the party!

Oops! Lost all your Hula Hoops, bored with the main character? Don't worry, there's a selection of new characters waiting for you in the store! Stop by and pick any character you want!

Forget the other top games! This race will give you unforgettable emotions!

Join in!
